column4: Can I upgrade 7.04 to 7.10 using the 7.10 cd?  How do I do it?
you can add the cd as a repository, but most of the packages will still be downloaded from the net afaik
at least that was my experience going from 6.10 to 7.04
LANG=xx_YY pidgin    You'll find the correct xx_YY by running «locale -a»
